item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Degree Logo Degree deodorants and antiperspirants are intelligently designed to work as hard as you do. We make it our business to know more about sweat, and what we learn informs every product innovation. Source
You can download theDegreelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Degree
item.description: Degree deodorants and antiperspirants are intelligently designed to work as hard as you do. We make it our business to know more about sweat, and what we learn informs every product innovation. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Downy Softeners Logo
At Downy, we’re honored to be a brand trusted by so many families around the world, and we’re always working to keep your trust. We know you may be interested in what’s in the products you use, so we want to share how our ingredients work and fill you in on the steps we take to ensure that all of our Downy products — from Liquid Fabric Conditioners to Dryer Sheets to Scent Beads to Wrinkle Release Sprays — are safe to use every day in your home (and in ours).
You can download theDownylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Downy
item.description: At Downy, we’re honored to be a brand trusted by so many families around the world, and we’re always working to keep your trust. We know you may be interested in what’s in the products you use, so we want to share how our ingredients work and fill you in on the steps we take to ensure that all of our Downy products — from Liquid Fabric Conditioners to Dryer Sheets to Scent Beads to Wrinkle Release Sprays — are safe to use every day in your home (and in ours).

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Durex Logo
Durex is a brand of condoms and personal lubricants owned by Reckitt Benckiser. It was initially developed in London under the purview of the London Rubber Company and British Latex Products Ltd, where it was manufactured between 1932 and 1994. The London Rubber Company was formed in 1915, and the Durex brand name was launched in 1929 although London Rubber did not begin manufacturing own-brand condoms until 1932, in collaboration with a rubber technology student from Poland named Lucian Landau.
You can download theDurexlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Durex
item.description: Durex is a brand of condoms and personal lubricants owned by Reckitt Benckiser. It was initially developed in London under the purview of the London Rubber Company and British Latex Products Ltd, where it was manufactured between 1932 and 1994. The London Rubber Company was formed in 1915, and the Durex brand name was launched in 1929 although London Rubber did not begin manufacturing own-brand condoms until 1932, in collaboration with a rubber technology student from Poland named Lucian Landau.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Always Logo
Always is an American brand of menstrual hygiene products, including maxi pads, ultra thin pads, pantyliners, disposable underwear for night-time wear, and vaginal wipes. A sister concern of Procter & Gamble, it was first introduced in the United States in test markets in the spring of 1983, then nationally in May 1984. By the end of 1984, Always had also been introduced internationally in United Kingdom, Canada, France, Germany, and Africa.
You can download theAlwayslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Always
item.description: Always is an American brand of menstrual hygiene products, including maxi pads, ultra thin pads, pantyliners, disposable underwear for night-time wear, and vaginal wipes. A sister concern of Procter & Gamble, it was first introduced in the United States in test markets in the spring of 1983, then nationally in May 1984. By the end of 1984, Always had also been introduced internationally in United Kingdom, Canada, France, Germany, and Africa.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
American Eagle Outfitters Logo
American Eagle Outfitters, Inc., also known as American Eagle, is an American lifestyle, clothing, and accessories retailer headquartered at SouthSide Works in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It was founded in 1977 by brothers Jerry and Mark Silverman as a subsidiary of Retail Ventures, Inc., a company that also owned and operated Silverman’s Menswear. The Silvermans sold their ownership interests in 1991 to Jacob Price of Knoxville, Tennessee. American Eagle Outfitters is also the parent company of Aerie.
You can download theAmerican Eagle Outfitterslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: American Eagle Outfitters
item.description: American Eagle Outfitters, Inc., also known as American Eagle, is an American lifestyle, clothing, and accessories retailer headquartered at SouthSide Works in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It was founded in 1977 by brothers Jerry and Mark Silverman as a subsidiary of Retail Ventures, Inc., a company that also owned and operated Silverman’s Menswear. The Silvermans sold their ownership interests in 1991 to Jacob Price of Knoxville, Tennessee. American Eagle Outfitters is also the parent company of Aerie.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
McBride Logo McBride plc is a leading British-based manufacturing business, noted as being Europe’s biggest maker of retailer own brand household goods. The business also provides contract manufacturing for brand owners. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE SmallCap Index. Source
You can download theMcBridelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Dove Logo
Dove is an American personal care brand owned by Unilever originating in the United States. Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues.
You can download theDovelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Oral-B Logo
Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source
You can download theOral-Blogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Oral-B
item.description: Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tampax Logo
Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source
You can download theTampaxlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tampax
item.description: Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tide Logo
Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source
You can download theTidelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tide
item.description: Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Uniliver Logo
Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source
You can download theUniliverlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Uniliver
item.description: Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source
